
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("absenteeismData.csv") %>% 
  filter(Grade == "All Grades" & Year =='2020-21')
```

```{r}
data2 <- read.csv("demographicData.csv") %>% 
  filter(Year =='2020-21')
```

```{r}
joined_data <- data %>%
  left_join(data2, by="DBN", suffix=c("",".y")) %>%
  select(-ends_with(".y"))
```
